kanata_executable.description: A path to a kanata executable.

kanata_config.description: A path to a kanata configuration file. It will be passed as `--cfg=<value>` arg to kanata.

autorun.description: Whether the preset will be automatically ran at kanata-tray startup.

tcp_port.description: A TCP port number. This should generally be between 1000 and 65535. It will be passed as `--port=<value>` arg to kanata.

additionalProperties.description: A layer name to icon path mapping.

layer_icons.description: An map of layer names to icon paths.

cmd_template.description: A command template for all hooks. It must contain exactly 1 occurence of `{}`, which will be replaced with hook command.

pre-start.description: Commands to run before running a preset. Will block kanata-tray until the hook process exits or 3 second timeout expires.

post-start.description: Commands to run after kanata in a given preset has fully started. Will block kanata-tray until the hook process exits or 3 second timeout expires.

post-start-async.description: Commands to run after kanata in a given preset has fully started. It can run indefinitely and will eventually be stopped when stopping preset.

post-stop.description: Commands to run after stopping a preset. Will block kanata-tray until the hook process exits or 3 second timeout expires.

hooks.description: Allows running additional scripts/programs on specific events.

extra_args.description: You may pass extra arguments to kanata except for the port (use tcp_port instead), such as --nodelay, additional --cfg params, etc.

autorestart_on_crash.description: Whether the preset will be automatically restarted whenever kanata crashes.

preset.description: Preset defines the settings that kanata will be run with when the preset gets selected in kanata-tray menu.

allow_concurrent_presets.description: Toggle for running presets concurrently or stopping before switching to a new one.

control_server_enable.description: Optional TCP control server to listen for remote commands, such as stopping/starting a preset. Reference: https://github.com/rszyma/kanata-tray/blob/main/doc/control_server.md

control_server_port.description: TCP port to run control server on.

general.description: Options that apply to kanata-tray behavior in general.

defaults.description: You can override default preset fields here.

presets.description: Defines presets that will be available in kanata-tray menu.
